label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"鸡盲肠肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"鸡黑头病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":13,"end":21,"text":"鸡传染性盲肠肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":22,"end":27,"text":"单细胞虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":28,"end":33,"text":"组织滴虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":39,"end":45,"text":"急性寄生虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":35,"end":36,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":47,"end":48,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"头部变黑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"变黑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":64,"text":"肝脏表面出现扣状坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":64,"text":"扣状坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":72,"text":"盲肠溃疡性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"头部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":65,"end":67,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":67,"end":72,"text":"溃疡性炎症","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 鸡盲肠肝炎即鸡黑头病，也叫鸡传染性盲肠肝炎或单细胞虫病、组织滴虫病，是鸡的一种急性寄生虫病，以鸡头部变黑，肝脏表面出现扣状坏死灶和盲肠溃疡性炎症为特征。

label: [{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"幼鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":31,"end":32,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":34,"end":38,"text":"急性经过","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: (一)流行病学特征：幼鸡易感性强，多发生于2周龄至3~4月龄的鸡，呈急性经过。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"隐性经过","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 成年鸡也可感染，呈隐性经过，成为带虫者。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"肝炎单细胞虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"患鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":52,"end":55,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":58,"end":61,"text":"健康鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 病原是肝炎单细胞虫，体型小，存在于患鸡的盲肠和肝脏内，随粪便排出体外，污染饲料、饮水、场地与周围环境，经消化道感染，健康鸡食入后患病。

label: [{"start":17,"end":22,"text":"鸡盲肠肝炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 有时蟋蟀、苍蝇、蚊蚋等也可带虫成为鸡盲肠肝炎的传递因素。

label: [{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":35,"text":"维生素A缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":53,"end":58,"text":"鸡盲肠肝炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 所以，鸡群饲养管理环境不良、环境卫生条件差、饲料配比不当、维生素A缺乏、通风不良、光线不足、拥挤等均可促进鸡盲肠肝炎的发生。

label: [{"start":9,"end":10,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":17,"text":"头部皮肤黑紫色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"黑紫色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":18,"end":23,"text":"顽固性腹泻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":29,"text":"淡绿色粪便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"淡绿色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"头部皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (二)临床症状：以鸡头部皮肤黑紫色、顽固性腹泻、淡绿色粪便为特征。

label: [{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"羽毛蓬乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"蓬乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"翅下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"食欲减退","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"身体蜷缩","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":16,"text":"翅","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 其他如病鸡精神沉郁，羽毛蓬乱，翅下垂，食欲减退，身体蜷缩等一般症状。

label: [{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (三)剖检变化：重要的变化一是肝脏，二是盲肠，病变明显。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"肝脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"溃疡病灶","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 肝脏肿大，其表面有大小不等的溃疡病灶。

label: [{"start":3,"end":8,"text":"出血性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"盲肠有出血性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"肠襞肥厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"肥厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":27,"text":"内容物混有血液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":40,"text":"干酪样物质","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"肠襞变薄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"变薄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":58,"text":"肌层几乎不存在","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":61,"end":66,"text":"盲肠襞破坏","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":64,"end":66,"text":"破坏","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"穿孔","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":72,"end":75,"text":"腹膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"肠襞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"肠襞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":50,"text":"黏膜层","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":51,"end":53,"text":"肌层","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":61,"end":64,"text":"盲肠襞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 盲肠有出血性炎症、肿大、肠襞肥厚似香肠，内容物混有血液，有时充满坚硬、干酪样物质，使肠襞变薄，黏膜层、肌层几乎不存在，有时盲肠襞破坏、穿孔，诱发腹膜炎。

label: [{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"盲肠肠芯","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"肠襞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":88,"end":90,"text":"细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (四)实验室诊断：取盲肠肠芯与肠襞之间新鲜内容物置载玻片上，加入少量37～40℃生理盐水混匀，加盖玻片后，在500倍显微镜下观察，即可见钟摆样来回游动的虫体，直径5～30微米，细胞外质透明，内质呈颗粒状，并有气泡，细胞核呈泡状，有1根很长的鞭毛。

label: [{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 从肝脏病变处取样时，则虫体呈圆形、卵圆形或不正圆形，其直径为4～21微米，无鞭毛。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"加强饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"合理配料","labels":["control"]},{"start":12,"end":21,"text":"保证维生素A的供给","labels":["control"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"维生素A","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 加强饲养管理，合理配料，保证维生素A的供给，以提高抗病能力。

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"改善环境卫生条件","labels":["control"]},{"start":9,"end":15,"text":"及时清理粪便","labels":["control"]},{"start":16,"end":22,"text":"场地彻底消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":23,"end":29,"text":"鸡舍通风良好","labels":["control"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"光照充足","labels":["control"]},{"start":35,"end":41,"text":"避免鸡群拥挤","labels":["control"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 改善环境卫生条件，及时清理粪便，场地彻底消毒，鸡舍通风良好，光照充足，避免鸡群拥挤。

label: [{"start":1,"end":8,"text":"鸡盲肠肝炎原体","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"异刺线虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":22,"end":34,"text":"及时驱除鸡体内的异刺线虫","labels":["control"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"彻底消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":44,"end":49,"text":"鸡盲肠肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"异刺线虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 因鸡盲肠肝炎原体常钻入异刺线虫的虫卵中，所以及时驱除鸡体内的异刺线虫，并彻底消毒，对预防鸡盲肠肝炎的发生具有重要意义。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"药物治疗","labels":["control"]},{"start":5,"end":10,"text":"新胂凡纳明","labels":["drug"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"静脉注射","labels":["control"]}]
text: 药物治疗：新胂凡纳明(914),按每千克体重50毫克静脉注射，每天1次，连用3天。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"甲硝哒唑","labels":["drug"]},{"start":14,"end":19,"text":"混入饲料中","labels":["control"]}]
text: 甲硝哒唑，按0.08%的比例混入饲料中，连喂7天。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"鸡盲肠肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"火鸡组织滴虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":40,"end":43,"text":"原虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":46,"end":51,"text":"鸡盲肠肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":52,"end":55,"text":"黑头病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"盲肠溃疡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"溃疡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":29,"text":"肝脏表面坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"肝脏表面","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":34,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"火鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡盲肠肝炎是由火鸡组织滴虫引起的。以盲肠溃疡和肝脏表面坏死为特征的鸡和火鸡的一种原虫病，又称鸡盲肠肝炎或黑头病。

label: [{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"火鸡雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"禽类","labels":["type"]}]
text: 多发于火鸡雏和雏鸡，成年鸡也能感染但病情较轻，其他禽类有时也可感染。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"火鸡组织滴虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":10,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 火鸡组织滴虫寄生于鸡的肝脏和盲肠内，形态多样，大小不一。

label: [{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"火鸡组织滴虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 非阿米巴阶段的火鸡组织滴虫近似球形，直径为3~16μm。

label: [{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"肠壁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"肝脏组织","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 单个或成堆存在于肠壁和肝脏组织中，虫体没有鞭毛。阿米巴阶段的虫体呈高度多样性，常伸出一个或数个伪足，有一根粗壮的鞭毛：细胞核为球形或卵圆形。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"火鸡组织滴虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 火鸡组织滴虫对外界环境的抵抗力不强，在外界环境中迅速死亡。

label: [{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"异刺线虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"卵巢","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"异刺线虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 但它通常在异刺线虫的卵巢中繁殖，并进入卵内，随异刺线虫的卵排到体外，在外界环境中能长期存活，成为重要的感染源。

label: [{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"异刺线虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"组织滴虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":54,"end":55,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 蚯蚓吞食异刺线虫的虫卵后，组织滴虫随同虫卵进入蚯蚓体内，并开始孵化，孵化出的幼虫在蚯蚓体内生存至侵袭阶段，当鸡啄食了这种蚯蚓即可引起感染。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡组织滴虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡组织滴虫病多发生于夏季，4~6周龄的雏鸡最易感，死亡率也最高，成年鸡多为带虫者。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"精神萎靡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"闭目呆立","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"怕冷","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"拥挤成堆","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"食欲减退","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"羽毛松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"两翅下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":38,"end":49,"text":"排出淡黄色或淡绿色稀粪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":50,"end":55,"text":"严重者带血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":43,"text":"淡黄色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":47,"text":"淡绿色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":8,"end":9,"text":"目","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"两翅","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":49,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡精神萎靡，闭目呆立，怕冷，拥挤成堆；食欲减退或消失，羽毛松乱，两翅下垂，排出淡黄色或淡绿色稀粪，严重者带血；

label: [{"start":5,"end":12,"text":"鸡冠常呈蓝紫色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"蓝紫色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"黑色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"头部皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"黑头病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 头部皮肤和鸡冠常呈蓝紫色或黑色，故称为黑头病。病程一般1~3周。

label: [{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"康复鸡体","labels":["type"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"组织滴虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 病愈康复鸡体内仍有组织滴虫，带虫可长达数周或数月。成年鸡很少出现症状。

label: [{"start":8,"end":14,"text":"盲肠异常膨大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"异常膨大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"肠壁肥厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"肥厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":28,"text":"盲肠内充满浆液性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"浆液性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":35,"text":"出血性渗出物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":46,"text":"渗出物常发生干酪样化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":57,"text":"干酪样的盲肠肠心","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":52,"text":"干酪样","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"肠壁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":53,"end":57,"text":"盲肠肠心","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 剖检时一侧或两侧盲肠异常膨大，肠壁肥厚，盲肠内充满浆液性和出血性渗出物，渗出物常发生干酪样化，形成干酪样的盲肠肠心。

label: [{"start":2,"end":8,"text":"盲肠黏膜坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"溃疡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"肠壁穿孔","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"穿孔","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"腹膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"盲肠黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"肠壁","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 有的盲肠黏膜坏死、增厚，形成溃疡，甚至肠壁穿孔，引起腹膜炎。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"肝脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":24,"text":"中央稍下陷","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":32,"text":"淡绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":38,"text":"边缘略隆起","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"大小不一","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":18,"text":"不规则形病灶","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 肝脏肿大，表面形成圆形或不规则形病灶，中央稍下陷，呈黄色或淡绿色，边缘略隆起，大小不一。

label: [{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"组织滴虫病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 在一般情况下，根据组织滴虫病的特异性肉眼病变特点和症状便可诊断。

label: [{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":60,"end":66,"text":"火鸡组织滴虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 若要确诊须观察到虫体，通常是采集新剖检病鸡的盲肠内容物，用40℃左右的生理盐水稀释均匀，做成悬滴标本镜检，可看到能活动的火鸡组织滴虫。

label: [{"start":1,"end":7,"text":"鸡组织滴虫病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 对鸡组织滴虫病可选用以下药物进行治疗。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"呋喃唑酮","labels":["drug"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"痢特灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"饲喂","labels":["control"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"混饮","labels":["control"]}]
text: (1)呋喃唑酮(痢特灵)。按0.022%~0.03%混入饲料中饲喂或0.02%混饮，休药期为5天。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"二甲基硝咪唑","labels":["drug"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"饲喂","labels":["control"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]}]
text: (2)二甲基硝咪唑。按0.06%～0.08%混入饲料中饲喂，每5天为一个疗程，正在产蛋的鸡群不能饲喂，休药期为5天。

label: [{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"甲硝唑","labels":["drug"]},{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"灭滴灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"饲喂","labels":["control"]}]
text: (3)甲硝唑(灭滴灵)。按0.02%混入饲料饲喂，每天3次，连喂5天。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"硝苯胂酸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"饲喂","labels":["control"]}]
text: (4)硝苯胂酸。按0.019%混入饲料中饲喂，休药期为5天。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"加强消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":10,"end":17,"text":"鸡舍内保持干燥","labels":["control"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"清洁","labels":["control"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"通风","labels":["control"]},{"start":24,"end":29,"text":"良好的光照","labels":["control"]},{"start":30,"end":37,"text":"尽可能离地饲养","labels":["control"]}]
text: 加强消毒和饲养管理，鸡舍内保持干燥、清洁、通风、良好的光照，尽可能离地饲养。

label: [{"start":4,"end":9,"text":"鸡异刺线虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":22,"end":30,"text":"氢氧化钠溶液消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":0,"end":9,"text":"定期驱除鸡异刺线虫","labels":["control"]},{"start":22,"end":28,"text":"氢氧化钠溶液","labels":["drug"]},{"start":32,"end":38,"text":"立即进行隔离","labels":["control"]},{"start":42,"end":47,"text":"宰杀重病鸡","labels":["control"]},{"start":44,"end":47,"text":"重病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 定期驱除鸡异刺线虫，对已发病的鸡舍可用3%的氢氧化钠溶液消毒，并立即进行隔离，淘汰或宰杀重病鸡。
